review.openers: This track hits with a clean hook and a confident groove.
A tight intro that immediately sets the mood.
It starts subtle, then blooms into something catchy.
review.middles: The rhythm stays crisp, letting the melody do the talking.
Small details in the arrangement keep it replayable.
The chorus lands with a satisfying lift.
review.closers: Overall, it feels polished and oddly addictive.
A solid pick for late-night listening.
